description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE BASIC CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

The .NET Framework- An Overview, Developing Console Application, C#.NET Language Basics, Introduction to Object Oriented Features, OOP Encapsulation,Inheritance, Polymorphism & Interface, and Exception handling
title: Microsoft Visual C#.Net - Fundamentals
